testsuite.name: index

failure.message: L'entête existe sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (552ms)
Le menu de navigation existe dans l'entête in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (549ms)
Le menu de navigation a l'id 'nav-bar' in 500ms - expected "contains 'nav-bar'" but got: "element could not be located" (548ms)
Le menu de navigation a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (535ms)
Le menu de navigation contient une liste in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (550ms)
La liste a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (523ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le menu de navigation doit comporter 3 liens.) - expected "3" but got: "0" (0ms)
L'élément 'main' est présent sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (547ms)
L'élément 'main' a l'id 'main-area' in 500ms - expected "contains 'main-area'" but got: "element could not be located" (528ms)
L'élément 'main' a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (527ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le contenu principal doit contenir 3 éléments div) - expected "3" but got: "0" (0ms)
Le pied de page existe in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (560ms)
L'élément 'footer' a l'id 'playing-bar' in 500ms - expected "contains 'playing-bar'" but got: "element could not be located" (535ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le pied de page doit contenir 2 noms) - expected "2" but got: "0" (0ms)

error.message: Failed [equal]: (Le pied de page doit contenir 2 noms) - expected [0;32m"2"[0m but got: [0;31m"0"[0m [0;90m(0ms)[0m

testcase.name: Tests de la barre de recherche

failure.message: Un conteneur pour la barre de recherche est présent sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (553ms)
La barre de recherche est un formulaire avec id 'search-form' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (556ms)
Le formulaire a la classe 'flex-row' in 500ms - expected "has flex-row" but got: "element could not be located" (539ms)
La barre de recherche est un input avec id 'search-input' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (545ms)
La barre de recherche est de type 'text' in 500ms - expected "contains 'text'" but got: "element could not be located" (528ms)
La barre de recherche contient un bouton in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (540ms)
Le bouton a les classes 'fa fa-2x fa-search' in 500ms - expected "has fa fa-2x fa-search" but got: "element could not be located" (536ms)
Le bouton de recherche est de type 'submit' in 500ms - expected "contains 'submit'" but got: "element could not be located" (537ms)

error.message: Le bouton de recherche est de type 'submit' in 500ms - expected [0;32m"contains 'submit'"[0m but got: [0;31m"element could not be located"[0m [0;90m(537ms)[0m
